text: Stevan Ostojić (Serbian Cyrillic: Стеван Остојић; 20 August 1941 – 15 May 2022) was a Serbian professional footballer. He played as a striker. He played for the Yugoslavia national football team from 1964 until 1971. Ostojić died on 15 May 2022 in Belgrade, Serbia at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Serbian footballers
title: Stevan Ostojić
